mapper.sql: id, title, url, image, price, `type`, watch_num, goodNum, `state`, sort, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by, del_flag
mapper.insert: insert into tb_course (id, title, url, image, price, `type`, watch_num, goodNum, `state`, sort, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by, del_flag ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{watchNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{goodnum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{sort,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT} )

title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update tb_course set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=BIGINT}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, watch_num = #{watchNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, goodNum = #{goodnum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select title,image,type,state,price from tb_course
title like '%${search}%'
order by sort desc
select title,image,type,state,price from tb_course order by sort desc limit ${limit}
